uniequip_002_ines.name: Shadow Weaver
uniequip_002_ines.EN: The first hit on each enemy <$ba.root>Binds</> the target for 5 seconds and <$ba.steal>Steals</> 90 ATK (effect expires when enemy is defeated or Ines retreats)
uniequip_002_ines.CN: 对每个敌人首次造成伤害后，使目标<$ba.root>束缚</>5秒并<$ba.steal>偷取</>其90点攻击力（持续至目标被击倒或伊内丝离场）

uniequip_003_logos.name: Lexical Evolution
uniequip_003_logos.EN: When attacking a target, there is a 40% chance to deal 60% ATK as Arts damage to a random target in attack range and <$ba.sluggish>Slow</> it for 0.8s.
uniequip_003_logos.CN: 对一个目标发起攻击时，有40%几率额外对攻击范围内一个随机目标造成相当于攻击力60%的法术伤害并使其<$ba.sluggish>停顿</>0.8秒
uniequip_003_logos.mod: 对一个目标发起攻击时，有40%几率额外对攻击范围内两个随机目标造成相当于攻击力63%的法术伤害并使其<$ba.sluggish>停顿</>0.8秒

uniequip_003_mudrok.EN: Takes 30% less damage from Sarkaz enemies

uniequip_002_puzzle.name: Sequence
uniequip_002_puzzle.EN: ATK increased to 120% and recover 2 additional SP when hitting an enemy with full HP
uniequip_002_puzzle.CN: 攻击命中生命值为满的敌人时攻击力提升至120%，并额外回复2点技力
